title: Simulation Learning Utilizing Experienced Experts to Strengthen Integrated Nursing Theory-Practice Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Supporting mobile learning environments based on smartphones, enhancing practical training through collaboration with field-experienced professionals

learning_goals: Learners can utilize authentic expert case studies to reduce the gap between theory and practice in mental health nursing scenarios
Learners can apply communication skills with over 80% accuracy in simulated clinical environments by incorporating expert feedback through VR simulations
Learners develop three or more creative problem-solving strategies through collaborative workshops with domain experts to integrate theoretical knowledge into practical contexts

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
